mean_en: a large business or organization that under the law has the rights and duties of an individual and follows a specific purpose
word_etyma: corporat(e)公司的 + ion名词后缀 → corporation 公司
sentence: Baicizhan is a corporation with great morals and strong work ethic!!!
sentence_trans: 百词斩是一家超有节操和职业道德的公司！！！
